p: Experiments on mice were performed in accordance with the Guidelines for Animal Experiments Performed at the National Institute of Infectious Diseases (NIID), under approval (no.117141, 118011, 118100, 118151, and 119021) from the Animal Welfare and Animal Care Committee of the NIID, Japan. All efforts were made to minimize pain and distress. The mice infected with JEV were observed daily for adverse reactions and signs of disease. For collection of organ samples, mice were euthanized using isoflurane.
